feed.title: Ilario Bonacina
feed.subtitle: I'm currently a Postdoctoral researcher at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm (Sweden).

entry.title: New website is online
entry.content: I’ve migrated my old webpage to GitHub and Jekyll.
entry.summary: I’ve migrated my old webpage to GitHub and Jekyll.

entry.title: Best Italian PhD Thesis in TCS 2016

link.title: Best Italian PhD Thesis in TCS 2016

entry.content:
My PhD thesis “Space in weak propositional proof systems” was awarded “Best Italian PhD Thesis in Theoretical Computer Science” for the year 2016 by the Italian chapter of the EATCS. See here for the list of all previous winners.

References

Bonacina, Ilario, "Space in weak propositional proof systems", Sapienza University of Rome, dec 2015. 
@phdthesis{Bonacina-phdthesis,
  author = {Bonacina, Ilario},
  title = {Space in weak propositional proof systems},
  school = {Sapienza University of Rome},
  year = {2015},
  month = dec
}
entry.summary: My PhD thesis “Space in weak propositional proof systems” was awarded “Best Italian PhD Thesis in Theoretical Computer Science” for the year 2016 by the Italian chapter of the EATCS. See here for the list of all previous winners.
